nodes.bodyText: The message is not displaying if we pass the exception
Since we go with enable prefix for other configs, shall we rename this config to something like enableLegacyMode?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +52,8 @@
   serverUrl = "https://localhost:9443"
   # The token endpoint context of the Key Manager server
   tokenContext = "oauth2"
+  # When Microgateway is used with older APIM versions for subscription validation by using KeyValidation service.
+  isLegacyKM = false

nodes.bodyText: Will fix this in the new branch
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +52,8 @@
   serverUrl = "https://localhost:9443"
   # The token endpoint context of the Key Manager server
   tokenContext = "oauth2"
+  # When Microgateway is used with older APIM versions for subscription validation by using KeyValidation service.
+  isLegacyKM = false
